---
page_title: "vaultsec Provider"
description: |-
  The vaultsec provider allows managing Vault secrets ephemerally.
---

# vaultsec Provider

The provider allows you to handle Vault secrets ephemerally.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "vaultsec" {
  address = "https://vault.example.com"
  token   = var.vault_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `address` (String) Vault address
- `token` (String, Sensitive) Vault token
